error.copy403:
Sorry, access to this resource on the server is denied.
Either check the URL, login or go home.
error.copy404:
Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be found.
Either check the URL, go home, or feel free to report this issue.
error.copy500:
An error ocurred and your request couldn’t be completed.
Either check the URL, go home, or feel free to report this issue.
error.copy503:
We are currently working on it,
so take a coffee brake and come back a bit later.

contribution.letsTalkDescription: Using Let’s Talk you can contact {user} and have a dialog, e.g. to discuss the content of the post or to give feed back or suggestions. You can set, whether your talk should be private or open.
contribution.messageSaveSuccess: Thanks for your contribution. You are awesome.
contribution.versusDescription: In Versus, one deals fairly and critically on the basis of factual counter-arguments on this subject. That means one must necessarily remain factual, if one wants to compare one another with knowledge and arguments. Because the lack of respect, unfairness with one another or even in a manner of hate-filled speech will lead to the exclusion.
contribution.writePostSectionPlaceholder: How do you call that story?
contribution.postPrivate: This contribution is private and can only be seen by you!

organization.requiredHint: These fields are required for your Organization to become public.
organization.name: Organization name
organization.nameHint: This is the name users can use to search for your Organisation and find it.
organization.foundingYearSectionPlaceholder: When has the organization be founded?
organization.deleted: The Organization has been deleted successfully.
organization.messageInReview:
In Review

Your organization has to be reviewed before others can see it.
Please be percent so one of our moderators can have a look. If it takes to long, feel free to write us an email.
organization.messageInReviewMod:
In Review

Hey seams like you are a Moderator. Please take a moment to validate this organization.
organization.messageInvisible:
Invisible

This organization has to be visible before others can see it.

layout.topbarFilterDescription: Here you can filter contributions that will be displayed or filtered. Click on or deselect the topic categories or emoticons filter only contributions that match your preference.

account.avatarUpload: Upload image for avatar or user profile
account.confirmOlderThan18: I confirm that I’m at least 18 years old.
account.confirmTermsOfUsage: By clicking “register” I agree with the {termsOfService} and confirm, that I read the {dataPrivacyStatement} of Human Connection.
account.loginRequired4CommentOrVote: You need to be logged-in to be able to comment, vote or rate on Human Connection.
account.name: Name
account.nameDescription: It is not essential that you provide your full name, but it’s easier for friends and contacts to be found on Human Connection.
account.verifyingErrorDescription: We were not able to verify your email address. Maybe the link you clicked is outdated. Please repeat the email verification.
account.verifyingResendDescription: Please confirm your email address to be able to create posts and comments:
account.verifyingResendSuccess: The confirmation was sent successfully to {email}. Please check your email account.
account.verifyingSuccessDescription: Your email address has been verified successfully.
account.welcomeGreeting1: Good to have you on bord{username}! Welcome at Human Connection. We hope you enjoy discovering and becoming active.
account.welcomeGreeting2: Let us embark on the journey into a future together!

login.forbidden: You have to be logged in to see the requested site
login.label: Login
login.description: If you have an account at Human Connection, please log-in here.
login.passwordResetDescription: Please fill in your email address and click on "Reset password".
login.passwordResetSuccess: Your new password was saved successfully.
login.passwordResetError: That did not work. Please ensure the current link is not outdated.
login.passwordResetRequestSuccess: We have sent you a message to your email address. Please follow the included link in order to reset your password.
login.passwordResetRequestError: That did not work. Please check if the inserted email address is correct.

register.description: Join in Human Connection and take part in the Community. Your account is free and will keep that way all along.
register.descriptionStep1: Check or enter your email address and invitation code which you got with your invite email. Make sure that you use the same email.
register.descriptionStep2: Create a secure password and repeat it in the second field. Use at least 8 chars, short sentences are easy to remember. We will show you how secure your password is.
register.label: Register
register.errorInviteCodeInvalid: The Invite code doesn't match the given email or is already in use
register.validationErrorIsFullAge: Please confirm that you are of full legal age

settings.deleteAccountMsg: Are you sure that you want to PERMANENTLY DELETE your user account?
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Be aware that your Comments, Posts, CanDo's... are important to our community. If you stil choose to delete those you have to mark them below.
settings.deleteAccountWarning: You CAN'T MANAGE and CAN'T RECOVER your Account, Posts... after deleting your account!
settings.downloadDescription: Here you can download your data by requesting a download link which will be send to your email address.
settings.downloadIsProcessing: You have successfully requested your download link. As soon as your download is ready you will receive an email.
settings.presentationDescription: Here you adjust the network presentation for example before doing screenshots for marketing.
settings.presentationWarning: Do screenshots for marketing ONLY WITH THAT SWITCH ON!
settings.presentationHideUsersWithoutTermsOfUseSi: Hide users without signed terms of use
settings.profileWelcomeText: Here is the place to edit your data.
settings.languageSettingsText: Here you can choose in which languages you see contributions and your interface.
settings.securityWelcomeText: This is the area about your account security. You can update your password regularly to increase security. Please don't share your password with anyone and keep it in a safe place.
settings.organizationDeleteModel: Are you sure you want to delete {organization}?
